word_mean: 在一动物群体中的某一个体。见blastozooid和oozooid

PerfectNetExp.abs: 群体的每个个体(zooid)很小,不及 lmm。外被一由外胚层分泌的角质或钙质的虫室(zooeciuml)。 个体头部不明显,前端体壁外突,于口周围形成圆形或马蹄形物,其上生有.
zoography 动物志学zooid 游动孢子zookeeper 动物园管理者
群体形态被覆型,在小石或螺壳上,单列分枝,是母分枝最末端的个虫产生两个端侧芽形成子分枝。 个虫特征个虫(Zooid)似长方形,始端较狭,远端较宽。前膜和膜下孔.
苔藓虫 Atactotoechus苔藓虫 zooid苔藓虫类 bryozoan

list.abs: 癌抑散 ethyleniminoquinone矮个虫 dwarf zooid矮化植物 dwarf plant
普通个虫 ordinary zooid末端个虫 distal zooid前位个虫 preceeding zooid

同近义词 ...sterile zooid 释义不育个虫 ; 不育个虫zooid person 个员

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from zoo- 'relating to animals' + -oid

means.word_mean: 1. one of the distinct individuals forming a colonial animal such as a bryozoan or hydrozoan

auth_sentence.content: There, he worked with Henry Threadgill's Zooid, and Rudresh Mahanthappa, among others, and released two albums on Pi Recordings.
